item.description:
Bill Belew pays his Silicon Valley mortgage through revenue from traffic alone to his blogs.

You're probably wondering:

  • How does he do it?
  • How did he get there?
  • How long did it take?
  • How old was he when he started?
  • Can anybody really, all smoke and mirrors aside, can anybody really do it?
  • What kind of commitment does it take?
  • What tools does he use?
  • What lessons has he learned along the way?
     

At this Meetup, Bill Belew will tell his story, in his no-nonsense way.
 
The bet is, when you leave, you will begin thinking that maybe, just maybe, you could make a living as a blogger, too. Or, you will go looking for a different profession.
 
In any event you won't know till you hear the rest of the story. And if you are interested in becoming a problogger, you don't want to miss this event.
item.name: How blogging pays my Silicon Valley mortgage+ - the Bill Belew story
